long_description: Keeping pace with you as you go throughout your day, the Osprey Momentum 30 bike pack comfortably hauls your laptop, tablet and more from campus, to work or to the cafe. Dedicated access to the padded laptop/tablet compartment makes it easy to get to your computer on the go; fits most laptops with screens up to 15 in. (measured diagonally). Panel-loading design offers easy access to the spacious main compartment, which has an internal document sleeve and mesh organization pockets to secure your stuff. Built-in, snug-fitting, high-visibility raincover can be deployed quickly and easily to protect pack's contents in wet weather. Top zip pocket secures smaller items-such as your keys, wallet, and phone-allowing fast and easy retrieval. Front stretch pocket is great for your U-lock or other items you want to reach quickly. Zippered side pockets stash other on-the-go essentials or small water bottles. Quickly and securely attach your helmet to the pack with the LidLock(TM) helmet clip. Side compression straps let you cinch down loads for jostle-free carrying. The back panel of the Osprey Momentum 30 bike pack features ample mesh-covered foam padding for breathable comfort.
short_description: Keeping pace with you as you go throughout your day, the Osprey Momentum 30 bike pack comfortably hauls your laptop, tablet and more from campus, to work or to the cafe.
